text: I love scary movies. I like blood and gore, and I love Halloween movies.
author: Carrie Underwood

text: My movies just kind of sneak up on you. I don't have to worry too much about what everybody is going to say. Anyway, I really don't pay attention to what the world says about my movies. I just care about what my buddies think.
author: Adam Sandler

text: I'm not looking to get away from anything. I like what I've done. I like what I get to do and I enjoy working with my friends. I loved those movies, but this is incredible.
author: Adam Sandler

text: Kids end up seeing my movies anyway but some of the mothers get mad at me so I figured I'd make one that I can't get yelled at for.
author: Adam Sandler
